=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: Accumulate Infosys; target of Rs 1531: KR Choksey
Source: Moneycontrol - News
Published: 2024-04-23 06:35
Related Stocks: RELIANCE, INFY
Categories: general

Summary:
KR Choksey recommended Accumulate rating on Infosys with a target price of Rs 1531 in its research report dated April 22, 2024.

Sentiment: neutral
